meanings.definition: The most respected or prominent woman in a particular field or organization.
meanings.sent1: In the world of literature, the doyennes are celebrated for their wisdom and talent.
meanings.sent2: She was considered the doyenne of the fashion industry due to her innovative designs.
meanings.sent3: The doyennes of the art world gathered for a lively debate on modern art trends.
meanings.sent4: As the doyenne of the music scene, her influence resonated across generations.
meanings.sent5: The doyennes of science paved the way for future discoveries with their groundbreaking research.

meanings.definition: A woman who is the oldest or most experienced in a group.
meanings.sent1: Among the hikers, she was the doyenne, guiding the group through the rugged terrain.
meanings.sent2: The doyenne of the knitting club shared her expertise with the beginners.
meanings.sent3: The doyenne of the book club always had the best recommendations for new reads.
meanings.sent4: As the doyenne of the cooking class, her recipes were always a hit with the students.
meanings.sent5: The doyenne of the gardening club had a green thumb that everyone admired.
